changeSet.author: gelli

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT if(DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = 255, 1, 0) as new_datatype FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE table_name='key_sequence_register' AND column_name='key_prefix' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = database();

changeSet.comment: Alter key_prefix data type from varchar(50) to varchar(255)

changeSet.author: mderamos

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) from nd_experiment means_exp INNER JOIN project means ON means.project_id = means_exp.project_id AND means.dataset_type_id = 2 INNER JOIN project plot ON plot.study_id = means.study_id AND plot.dataset_type_id = 4 INNER JOIN nd_experiment plot_exp ON plot_exp.project_id = plot.project_id INNER JOIN stock means_stock ON means_stock.stock_id = means_exp.stock_id INNER JOIN stock plot_stock ON plot_stock.stock_id = plot_exp.stock_id WHERE means_stock.uniquename = plot_stock.uniquename AND means_exp.stock_id != plot_stock.stock_id;

changeSet.comment: Set stock_id of means experiments to use plot experiments stock_id and delete unnecessary stock entries

changeSet.author: aldrin
changeSet.comment: Add project_id column to stock table

changeSet.author: aldrin

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM listnms lnms INNER JOIN listdata_project ldp ON lnms.listid = ldp.list_id INNER JOIN project p ON p.parent_project_id = lnms.projectid AND p.dataset_type_id = 4 WHERE lnms.listtype = 'STUDY' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM nd_experiment where project_id = p.project_id);

changeSet.comment: Migrate listdata_project to stock table. Only entry list from studies without plot experiments are migrated to the stock table.

changeSet.author: aldrin

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock WHERE stock.project_id IS NULL;

changeSet.comment: Associate existing stock records to their respective study
changeSet.sql: UPDATE stock INNER JOIN nd_experiment nde ON nde.stock_id = stock.stock_id INNER JOIN project p ON p.project_id = nde.project_id SET stock.project_id = p.study_id WHERE stock.project_id IS NULL;

changeSet.author: aldrin

not.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM listnms WHERE listnms.listtype = 'STUDY';

changeSet.comment: Delete all STUDY germplasm list and its data
changeSet.sql:
-- Delete all STUDY entry list data DELETE ldp FROM listnms INNER JOIN listdata_project ldp ON listnms.listid = ldp.list_id WHERE listnms.listtype = 'STUDY';
-- Delete all STUDY entry list DELETE FROM listnms WHERE listnms.listtype = 'STUDY';
